articles.author: Lauren Williams
articles.title: Lorraine Kelly shut down by rail boss Mick Lynch over strike 'celebrity' probe' - Express
articles.description: Lorraine Kelly was shut down by Mick Lynch during Wednesday's ITV show when she quizzed the rail boss on becoming a 'celebrity'.
articles.content:
@FlamingoBee1 exclaimed: "#MickLynch on #Lorraine. Standing up for workers with facts.....love it."
